original_title: I Was a Mail Order Bride
overview: Most people seem content in searching for a mate within a 20 mile radius of where they live, but for those with a taste for the exotic, we bring you World Wide Wife, a high-end introduction service. We give the term "Mail Order Bride" a whole new meaning, as satisfaction is absolutely guaranteed. When Wicked Pictures and award-winning director Brad Armstrong play match-maker with some of the most beautiful women on the planet - sparks are guaranteed to fly! No matter where in the world you come from, everyone understands the international language of LOVE.
title: I Was a Mail Order Bride
